comment: Equivalent expressions for a restriction of the function operation map. Unlike ` oF R ` which is a proper class, ` ( oF R |`` ( A X. B ) ) ` can be a set by ~ ofmresex , allowing it to be used as a function or structure argument. By ~ ofmresval , the restricted operation map values are the same as the original values, allowing theorems for ` oF R ` to be reused. (Contributed by NM, 20-Oct-2014.)
